title: Online arbitrage (working with one of the largest OA stores)
job_overview:
Are you ready to be challenged, pushed to your limits, and trained to become world-class?
We’re looking for a driven, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant with proven experience in Online Arbitrage to join a high-performing, fast-growing team.
???? About Us
• Our business is on track to generate $10 million in revenue this year through online arbitrage.
• In the past year alone, we crossed $7 million in sales with just myself, one purchasing VA, and one admin VA — proof that a small, elite team can accomplish massive results.
• We know exactly what quality sourcing looks like — and your performance will be 
• Include “ai” in your application title when you apply 
• racked closely using metrics like profit per ASIN and other key KPIs.
???? What We’re Looking For
This isn’t just another VA job. It’s a full commitment, high-accountability role for someone who:
• Already has solid sourcing skills (manual sourcing, reverse sourcing, storefront stalking, etc.).
• Is hungry to learn and grow, and can commit to getting the job done.
• Thrives in a results-driven environment and is willing to push beyond average.
Yes, the beginning will be intense — but if you have the mindset and potential, you’ll be personally trained to become a highly paid, elite sourcing machine.
???? What You Get
• Competitive base pay + future profit-sharing on high-performing ASINs.
• Bonuses, raises, and paid vacations for consistent high-level performance.
• A clear and fast growth path — but only if you deliver.
• I’m looking for somebody long-term. One of my virtual assistance has worked for me for almost 2 years and another one for a year.
???? Expectations
• Performance is everything. Your role and income will always be tied to clear KPIs.
• This is a full-time, no-side-hustles role. If you have other clients, do not apply.
• You’ll start with intense work hours. Once trust and consistency are proven, your schedule will become more flexible.
•       Paid trial period
? Requirements
• Proven experience in online arbitrage sourcing.
• Strong communication skills.
• Deep motivation and resilience — no shortcuts.
• Willingness to be coached and held to high standards.
???? To Apply
1. Submit 5 sample leads you believe are winners ( need to be good right now)
Make sure to submit leads with the initial application
o Source
o Buy cost
o Amazon selling price
o Estimated profit
o ROI
2. Briefly tell me:
o What sourcing methods you’re best at.

Final Word
This role isn’t easy. I have high standards, and I expect performance. But if you’re ready to go all in, I will invest in your growth, and you’ll become one of the best in this business.
High standards bring high rewards.
